dataarr.name: SPIDER-MAN 2
dataarr.description: Boasting an entertaining villain and deeper emotional focus, this is a nimble sequel that improves upon the original

dataarr.name: BATTLE ROYALE
dataarr.description: Battle Royale is a controversial and violent parable of adolescence, heightening teenage melodrama with life-or-death stakes.
